lead_paragraph: The company said it would continue to exempt co-branded products, like Doritos Locos Tacos, from its push to change ingredients.

headline.main: Exception to Taco Bell Shift on Artificial Ingredients
headline.print_headline: Exception To Taco Bell Shift On Artificial Ingredients

snippet: The company said it would continue to exempt co-branded products, like Doritos Locos Tacos, from its push to change ingredients.
